search_results.title: Evan Griffith | Children's Book Author & Editor
search_results.snippet: Evan Griffith is the author of Manatee Summer, Secrets of the Sea, and other books for young readers. He's also a writing instructor, freelance editor, and a faculty member at the Vermont College of Fine Arts Writing for Children and Young Adults MFA program.
